## Samelogic.init() method

Creates an instance of the client and then initializes it. This is a static method and is a convenience method for initializing through a single API call from the window object. This allows tools like Google Tag Manager to initialize the client instance without the `new` keyword being available.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static init(options: Options): Promise<Samelogic>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | [Options](./samelogic-js.options.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[Samelogic](./samelogic-js.samelogic.md)<!-- -->&gt;
